summary: REQ-10 is largely implemented by wrapping header and footer logos in a new square container utility (.logo-square) with object-fit: contain and by keeping the existing logo asset path. However, the BuildRequest also calls for cropping/resizing the actual logo image to remove padding/tab-like artifacts, and there is no evidence in the diff summary of any asset/image modification.

missing_requirements.requirement: Crop/resize the existing logo image (same filename/path) to a clean true square and remove any extra padding/expanded area that makes it look like header tabs are part of the image.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows only CSS/layout changes for rendering the logo in a square container; no static asset change is shown for /assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png, and no image file modifications are listed.

hallucinated_features.description: Site-wide color/theme overhaul (updating Tailwind/OKLCH variables such as --primary, --background, etc.) beyond logo square rendering.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to fix logo rendering (square, no stretching/overlap) and keep the same asset path; it does not request a palette/theme change.

hallucinated_features.description: Documentation claims that HeroSection, ServiceTiersSection, and ContactFormSection were updated to use a new red primary color.
hallucinated_features.reason: Those updates are not requested by the BuildRequest, and they are not supported by the modified-files list (only header/footer/index.css/etc. are shown as modified). This appears to be an unrequested/unsupported summary entry.
